message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $9,500.  What do you think?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity. However, given my budget constraints, I am only willing to pay up to $8,500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9,500 is already a very competitive price for this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $9,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I am able to offer $8,800. I hope this proposal works for you.
